{Story made by Brickhousebunny21 on SoFurry, Not my work}



It was a beautiful day in the forest, in every forest there's something amazing to see, it's nature, nature can be beautiful yet cruel, just like life, life and nature have smiliar descriptions, there both beautiful yet dangerous. A boy was walking around a lake, a smile was on his face, the boy was at least thirteen years old, about five feet and two inches tall, he had a blonde mullet of hair, short in the front and long in the back, blue eyes, he wore a black T-shirt with the peace sign on the front, blue jeans and silver tenny shoes. The boy was exploring the forest to watch pokemon in their environment, like bird watching.

"Come on Tiger, you'll find a pokemon if you just don't quit." said Tiger to himself.

Tiger had been searching for hour for a pokemon to watch, he took a turn to the right, away from the lake and closer to the bushes, he could hear a crunching sound coming from behind the bushes, he walked through and walked up to a tree, he walked around the tree and got closer to the source of the noise and after he made it behind the tree, he saw the first pokemon he's been looking for all day, it was a huge snorlax, but this snorlax looked different, it had really huge breasts, each boob was as big as a twenty inched screen television, her breast were fifteen inches long, this snorlax was a female. The crunching noise was from crushed coconuts, at least seven coconut shells were crushed and split open, it seems the female snorlax was drinking the coconut milk.

"Whoa, that's a big female snorlax." said Tiger amazed.

The female snorlax turned her head and spotted Tiger, she smiled at him and he noticed she had chubby cheeks too, broad arms, legs and paws, she even had large, luscious, red lips. She had got excited and immediately had a rush of energy surging through her, she ran towards Tiger, her foot steps were loud enough to make the ground shake, but Tiger managed to keep his balance.

"A cutie, come to momma and give her a hug, cutie." screamed the female snorlax in her motherly voice.

Tiger was frozen with fear, he couldn't move due to fear of being crushed to death by this overly friendly, female snorlax, he closed his eyes tight, ready for death to crush him, but it didn't happen, the boy opened his eyes as the female snorlax picked him up and hugged him, carrying Tiger in her broad arms, she had red lipstick on her lips to make herself look young and sexy in front of the little boy, that explained why her lips are red.

"Awww, your such a cutie." she said in a cute voice.

"Ma'am, your crushing me." said Tiger weakly.

The female snorlax had some sort of motherly behavior towards Tiger, she loosened her grip and held him gently enough for Tiger to breathe, he took a deep breath and let it out. Tiger starred at her with his cheeks blushing, sure he wanted observe a pokemon but this was more than he expected.

"I'm Daisy, but you can call me big momma." said Daisy giggling.

"I'm Tiger." said Tiger nervously.

Daisy shifted one of her arms to hug and hold Tiger with both of her arms, his face inches away from hers, but one of Tiger's eyes was starring at her enormous breasts, the other looking at her face. Daisy smiled and giggled in a cute tone.

"That's a cute name for a big boy." said Daisy giggling.

"Thanks." said Tiger blushing.

15.title: Legendary Pokemon Tribe

info.brief_description: You hate your family so you run away but pass out awaking to a new family of Pokemons!
info.description:
OK this is my first interactive story. So let just get to it.
You name is Kai and you hate your family. Your family were drunk so much and abused you so much and never cared a lot about you so you choose to run away. While running away you get tired and start to pass out. But as you start to pass out. You see a female Pokemon pick you up.

Rules:
1.No Killing the main character
2.Rebirth is aloud.
3.Only a Female Pokemon can pick up the main Charrie at the start
4.You can fall in love with a Pokemon.
5.No insane wars for no reason. IT MUST HAVE A REASON FOR A BATTLE WAR BETWEEN THE TWO POKEMONS!
6.Make sure it isn't a short paragraph. Make it wow Me and others. Unless it a choice thing like Do you fall in love with her?
